TextView.android:text: This centre is located in one of Polokwane’s most affluent areas, right next to Cycad Estate and walking distance from Bendor Village. It is a mere 3 minute drive from many of Polokwane’s biggest pre-primary, primary and high schools. Located just down the road from Cycad Centre you will find one of Polokwane's biggest office parks. If you are looking for a upmarket convenience centre in Polokwane this is the place to be.
